name: Koi Garden
description:
Koi Garden is 3D Realistic Koi collecting application.

*** Features ***

* 20+ Koi Fish.

* Cross-Breeding to get a new Koi.

*** Tutorial

Clean your pond, and you will get first koi.
Feed your koi. and get second koi.

Try Cross-breeding to get a new Koi.

Keep pond clean,and sometimes feed them again.

Try Cross-breeding to get all koi !!
